creator: Cruikshank, George, 1792-1878
title: A comic alphabet
description: Plates printed on a continuous strip of paper, folded in Japanese fashion; portrait of the publisher Tilt on back cover. cf. A. M. Cohn, George Cruikshank, no. 189.
titleStatement: A comic alphabet, designed, etched & published by George Cruikshank, No. 23 Myddelton Terrace, Pentonville
